cis.ramrodcs.addressbook

Class AddressBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.ramrodcs.addressbook.AddressBook

  • public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores lists of entries to use as an Address Book.
    Author:
    eewing
    See Also:
    DataEntry

        Load text file into a new address book

        Throws:

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile()
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Check for valid save file. If it exists, write contents of address book to said file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the address doesn't have a default save file stored.
